relation: ~100sqm full of loungy awesomeness with comfy chairs and couches
ad-hoc seating groups to discuss random topics, think of it as mini-barcamp style discussion groups
we've got a EKS OTUS DJ controller that works very well with Traktor et al, feel free to mix your tunes for everyone's enjoyment
~50sqm of room with tables, beamer, whiteboards, chairs and separate from the lounge
here you can manufacture your own PCBs with direct to copper printing, etching, reflowing. If you need specific components, please ask in advance or bring your own.
There's h0uz3' Mac workstation for video, sound, and photo editing
If you need to wreak havoc and trash some stuff, here's the room to do it in
A fully usable kitchen. You can cook stuff here.
Right in front of the kitchen if you want to chat with the cooks while doing your thing.
Right in front of the space we've got an area where you can have a smoke (no smoking inside) or grab the BBQ and prepare some food.
There _should_ be plenty of parking but we recommend using public transit which is very conveniently located.

textAfterTable: $$ The costs will be really low. The admission fee will be: 0.00 EUR 0.00 USD 0.00 BTC Relevant (Club-Mate, AfriCola, Applejuice) cooled drinks from the vending machine are available at 1.50 EUR for a half liter bottle. We've also got a snack vending machine to ensure proper late night sugar intake. There will most likely be food available at reasonable prices. Several supermarkets are within walking distance.
